title: #321: Order Out Of Chaos with Chris Roberts
description:
Thank you so much for tuning in for an emergency Tin Foil Hat with Sam Tripoli. This episode I welcome Esoteric researcher Chris Roberts to discuss anomalies in the tragic death of George Lloyd. This is truly a sad event and we must look into what happened, why it happened and what dark hand may be behind all of this chaos going down in the country right now? Thank you for your support.

Sam Tripoli's Live Gigs:
Kansas City, Mo: The Comedy Club KC June 4th-6th
https://www.thecomedyclubkc.com

Please check out Chris Roberts' Internet:
Instagram: @chriswayne92

Website: Awakenedoptimalhealth.com
